definition:
A *leaf* of a tree is any node which has degree of exactly 1. Put
another way, a leaf node of a rooted tree is any node which has no child
nodes.

$$\xymatrix{
& \bullet \ar@{-}[dl] \ar@{-}[dr] & & & \\
{\color{red}\bullet} & & \bullet \ar@{-}[dr]\ar@{-}[dl] & & \\
& \bullet \ar@{-}[dl] & & {\color{red}\bullet} & \\
{\color{red}\bullet} & & & & }$$

[Figure: A tree with leaf nodes highlighted in red.]{}
